00035 int SynonymContainer::createTrie()
00036 {
00037         if( _synonymTrie.create( TRIE_EXTEND_SIZE, TRIE_EXTEND_SIZE, TRIE_EXTEND_SIZE, TRIE_EXTEND_SIZE ) < 0 )
00038         {
00039                 cerr << "Can't create trie. So synonyms are not created..." << endl;
00040 
00041                 return 0;
00042         }
00043 
00044         return 1;       
00045 }

00047 int SynonymContainer::insertSynonym( EntryNInfo& ei, int posHeadword, const char* tPos )
00048 {
00049         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00050 
00051         if( _synonymTrie.insertKey( ei.entry.buffer(), trieNode ) )
00052         {
00053                 int index = 0;
00054                 if( (index = trieNode.getData()) > 0 )
00055                 {
00056                         ei.info &= HEADWORD_FLAG;
00057                         ei.info |= _infoList.size();
00058                         ei.info |= OVERLAP_FLAG;
00059 
00060                         if( _synonymList[ index ].info & OVERLAP_FLAG )
00061                         {
00062                                 int pos = _synonymList[ index ].info & 0xffff;
00063 
00064                                 if( _infoList[ pos ][ _infoList[ pos ].size() - 1 ] != posHeadword )
00065                                 {
00066                                         _infoList[ pos ].push_back( posHeadword );
00067                                 }
00068 
00069                                 ei.info |= pos;
00070                         }
00071                         else
00072                         {
00073                                 bool isAdded = true;
00074 
00075                                 vector<int> overlapList;
00076 
00077                                 if( _synonymList[ index ].info & HEADWORD_FLAG )
00078                                 {
00079                                         if( index != posHeadword )
00080                                         {
00081                                                 overlapList.push_back( index );
00082 
00083                                                 _synonymList[ index ].info |= OVERLAP_FLAG;
00084                                                 _synonymList[ index ].info &= ( _synonymList[ index ].info & 0xffff0000 );
00085                                                 _synonymList[ index ].info |= ( ei.info & 0xffff );
00086                                         }
00087                                         else isAdded = false;   
00088                                 }
00089                                 else
00090                                 {
00091                                         if( (_synonymList[ index ].info & ~(HEADWORD_FLAG | OVERLAP_FLAG)) != posHeadword )
00092                                         {
00093                                                 overlapList.push_back( _synonymList[ index ].info & ~(HEADWORD_FLAG | OVERLAP_FLAG) );
00094 
00095                                                 _synonymList[ index ].info |= OVERLAP_FLAG;
00096                                                 _synonymList[ index ].info &= ( _synonymList[ index ].info & 0xc0000000 );
00097                                                 _synonymList[ index ].info |= ( ei.info & 0xffff );
00098                                         }
00099                                         else isAdded = false;                                   
00100                                 }
00101 
00102                                 if( isAdded == true )
00103                                 {
00104                                         overlapList.push_back( posHeadword );
00105                                         _infoList.push_back( overlapList );
00106                                 }
00107                                 else
00108                                 {
00109                                         ei.info &= HEADWORD_FLAG;
00110                                         ei.info |= posHeadword;
00111                                 }
00112                         }
00113                 }
00114                 else
00115                 {
00116                         trieNode.setData( static_cast<int>(_synonymList.size()) );                      
00117                 }
00118 
00119                 if( tPos != 0 ) ei.entry = tPos;
00120                 ei.entry.replaceString( _wordDelim.buffer(), " " );
00121 
00122                 _synonymList.push_back( ei );
00123         }
00124         else
00125         {
00126                 return 0;
00127         }
00128 
00129         return 1;
00130 }

00132 int SynonymContainer::loadSynonym( StringEx pathDic, StringEx nameDic, StringEx strID )
00133 {
00134 //      cout << strID;
00135 
00136         if( !pathDic.endWith( "/" ) && !pathDic.endWith( "\\" ) ) pathDic += "/";
00137 
00138         pathDic += nameDic;
00139 
00140         if( _synonymDelim == _wordDelim )
00141         {
00142                 cerr << "Because delimeter among synonyms and delimiter among words are same, Can't not load synonym dictionary.\nPlease set delimiters differentlty.\n";
00143                 return 0;
00144         }
00145 
00146         ifstream fin( pathDic.buffer() );
00147 
00148         if( fin.fail() ) 
00149         {
00150 //      cerr << "Can't open " << pathDic << " file." << endl;
00151                 return -1;
00152         }
00153 
00154         if( !createTrie() )
00155         {
00156         fin.close();
00157                 return 0;
00158         }
00159 
00160         StringEx strBuffer;
00161 
00162 //      int cntDot = 0;
00163 
00164         int cnt         = 1;
00165         int posHeadword = 1;
00166 
00167         EntryNInfo ei;
00168         ei.info = 0;
00169         _synonymList.push_back( ei );           // 현재 트라이 구현상 0번 인덱스는 참조 못함, 임의의 값으로 세팅
00170 
00171         while( !fin.eof() )
00172         {
00173                 getline( fin, strBuffer );
00174 
00175                 if( strBuffer.startWith(";") || strBuffer.startWith("/") || strBuffer.startWith(" ") ||
00176                         strBuffer.startWith("\t") || strBuffer.startWith("\n") || strBuffer.startWith("\r") ) continue;
00177 
00178                 strBuffer.trimRight();
00179                 strBuffer.toLowerCase();
00180 
00181                 int i, strBufLen = (int)strBuffer.length();
00182                 int wdcnt = 0, wscnt = 0;
00183                                 
00184                 for( i = 0; i < strBufLen; i++ )
00185                 {
00186                         if( (wscnt == 0) && (_ts.getIndex( strBuffer[i] ) >= 0) )
00187                         {
00188                                 strBuffer.replace( i, 1, _synonymDelim );
00189                                 wscnt++;
00190                         }
00191                         else if( (wscnt > 0) && (_ts.getIndex( strBuffer[i] ) >= 0) )
00192                         {
00193                                 strBuffer.erase( i, 1 );
00194                                 strBufLen--;
00195                                 i--;
00196                                 wscnt++;
00197                         }
00198                         else if( (wdcnt == 0) && (_tw.getIndex( strBuffer[i] ) >= 0) )
00199                         {
00200                                 strBuffer.replace( i, 1, _wordDelim );
00201                                 wdcnt++;
00202                         }
00203                         else if( (wdcnt > 0) && (_tw.getIndex( strBuffer[i] ) >= 0) )
00204                         {
00205                                 strBuffer.erase( i, 1 );
00206                                 strBufLen--;
00207                                 i--;
00208                                 wdcnt++;
00209                         }
00210                         else
00211                         {
00212                                 wscnt = 0;
00213                                 wdcnt = 0;
00214                         }
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 char* pp   = strBuffer.buffer();
00218                 char* spos = pp;
00219                 char* epos = 0;
00220 
00221                 bool isHeadword = true;
00222 
00223                 while( (epos = strstr( spos, _synonymDelim.buffer() )) != 0 )
00224                 {
00225                         *epos = '\0';
00226 
00227                         ei.entry = spos;
00228 
00229                         char* tPos;
00230                         if( ei.entry.replaceString( _wordDelim.buffer(), "" ) > 0 ) tPos = spos;
00231                         else tPos = 0;
00232 
00233                         if( isHeadword )
00234                         {
00235                                 isHeadword  = false;
00236                                 posHeadword = cnt;
00237 
00238                                 ei.info = HEADWORD_FLAG;
00239                         }
00240                         else
00241                         {
00242                                 ei.info = posHeadword;
00243                         }
00244 
00245                         cnt++;
00246 
00247                         if( insertSynonym( ei, posHeadword, tPos ) <= 0 )
00248                         {
00249                                 cerr << "Error in reading " << strID << " dic.." << endl;
00250                         }
00251 
00252                         spos = epos + 1;
00253 
00254                         while( (*spos) != 0 && isspace( (*spos) & 0xff ) ) spos++;
00255                 }
00256 
00257                 if( (*spos) != 0 )
00258                 {
00259                         ei.entry = spos;
00260 
00261                         char* tPos;
00262                         if( ei.entry.replaceString( _wordDelim.buffer(), "" ) > 0 ) tPos = spos;
00263                         else tPos = 0;
00264 
00265                         if( isHeadword )
00266                         {
00267                                 isHeadword  = false;
00268                                 posHeadword = cnt;
00269 
00270                                 ei.info = HEADWORD_FLAG;
00271                         }
00272                         else
00273                         {
00274                                 ei.info = posHeadword;
00275                         }
00276 
00277                         cnt++;
00278 
00279                         if( insertSynonym( ei, posHeadword, tPos ) <= 0 )
00280                         {
00281                                 cerr << "Error in reading " << strID << " dic.." << endl;
00282                         }
00283                 }
00284 
00285                 if( isHeadword != true )
00286                 {
00287                         _synonymList[posHeadword].info |= (cnt - posHeadword) << 16;
00288                 }
00289 
00290 //              if( (cntDot++ % 100) == 0 ) cout << ".";
00291         }
00292 
00293 //      cout << endl;
00294     fin.close();
00295 
00296         return 1;
00297 }

00306 int SynonymContainer::searchNgetInfoFromSynonymTrie( const char* str, WK_Synonym* pwks )
00307 {
00308         Synonym* ps = (Synonym *)pwks;
00309 
00310         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00311 
00312         ps->setContainer ( this );
00313         ps->setEntryNInfo( 0 );
00314 
00315         ps->setOverlapCount( 0 );
00316 
00317         if( str == 0 ) return 0;
00318 
00319         size_t len;
00320 
00321         len = strlen( str ); 
00322 
00323         size_t i;
00324 
00325         for( i = 0; (i < len) && (str[i] != 0); i++ )
00326         {
00327                 if( !(_synonymTrie.findNode( str[i], trieNode )) ) return 0;
00328         }
00329 
00330         if( trieNode.mpData )
00331         {
00332                 if( trieNode.getData() <= static_cast<int>( _synonymList.size() ) )
00333                 {       
00334                         ps->setEntryNInfo( &( _synonymList[ trieNode.getData() ] ) );
00335                         ps->setPosSynonymList( trieNode.getData() );
00336 
00337                         if( trieNode.mState > 0 ) ps->setMoreLong();
00338 
00339                         if( _synonymList[ trieNode.getData() ].info & OVERLAP_FLAG )
00340                         {
00341                                 ps->setOverlapCount( static_cast<int>( this->_infoList[ (_synonymList[ trieNode.getData() ].info & 0xffff) ].size() ) );
00342                                 //return //_cntOverlap = static_cast<int>( _pContainer->_infoList[ (_synonymList[ trieNode.getData() ].info & 0xffff) ].size() );                                       
00343                         }
00344                         else
00345                         {
00346                                 ps->setOverlapCount( 1 );
00347                                 //return //_cntOverlap = 1;                                     
00348                         }
00349 
00350                         return 1;
00351                 }
00352         }
00353         
00354         if( trieNode.mState > 0 ) ps->setMoreLong();
00355 
00356         return 0;
00357 }

00399 int Synonym::getOverlapCount()
00400 {
00401         if( _pContainer == 0 || _pEi == 0 ) 
00402         {
00403                 return _cntOverlap = 0;
00404         }
00405 
00406         if( _pEi->info & OVERLAP_FLAG )
00407         {
00408                 return _cntOverlap = static_cast<int>( _pContainer->_infoList[ (_pEi->info & 0xffff) ].size() );                
00409         }
00410         else
00411         {
00412                 return _cntOverlap = 1;
00413         }
00414 }
00415 
00416 int Synonym::getSynonymCountByIndex( int index )
00417 {
00418         if( _pContainer == 0 || _pEi == 0 || _cntOverlap == 0 || _cntOverlap < index + 1 ) return 0;
00419 
00420         if( _cntOverlap == 1 )
00421         {
00422                 if( index > 0 ) return 0;
00423 
00424                 if( _pEi->info & HEADWORD_FLAG )
00425                 {
00426                         return ( _pEi->info & 0x3fff0000 ) >> 16;
00427                 }
00428                 else 
00429                 {
00430                         return ( _pContainer->_synonymList[ _pEi->info & ~(HEADWORD_FLAG | OVERLAP_FLAG) ].info & 0x3fff0000 ) >> 16;
00431                 }
00432         }
00433 
00434         return ( _pContainer->_synonymList[ _pContainer->_infoList[ (_pEi->info & 0xffff) ][ index ] ].info & 0x3fff0000 ) >> 16;
00435 }
00436 
00437 char* Synonym::getHeadWord( int index )
00438 {
00439         if( _pContainer == 0 || _pEi == 0 || _cntOverlap == 0 || _cntOverlap < index + 1 ) return 0;
00440 
00441         if( _cntOverlap == 1 )
00442         {
00443                 if( index > 0 ) return 0;
00444 
00445                 if( _pEi->info & HEADWORD_FLAG )
00446                 {
00447                         if( _posSynonymList >= static_cast<int>(_pContainer->_synonymList.size()) ) return 0;
00448 
00449                         return _pContainer->_synonymList[ _posSynonymList ].entry.buffer();
00450                 }
00451                 else
00452                 {
00453                         return _pContainer->_synonymList[ _pEi->info & ~(HEADWORD_FLAG | OVERLAP_FLAG) ].entry.buffer();
00454                 }
00455         }
00456 
00457         return _pContainer->_synonymList[ _pContainer->_infoList[ (_pEi->info & 0xffff) ][ index ] ].entry.buffer();
00458 }

00460 char* Synonym::getWord( int index, int offset )
00461 {
00462         if( _pContainer == 0 || _pEi == 0 || _cntOverlap == 0 || _cntOverlap < index + 1 ) return 0;
00463 
00464         if( _cntOverlap == 1 )
00465         {
00466                 if( index > 0 ) return 0;
00467 
00468                 if( _pEi->info & HEADWORD_FLAG )
00469                 {
00470                         if( ((_pContainer->_synonymList[ _posSynonymList ].info & 0x3fff0000) >> 16) < offset ) return 0;
00471 
00472                         return _pContainer->_synonymList[ _posSynonymList + offset ].entry.buffer();
00473                 }
00474                 else
00475                 {
00476                         int tempPos = _pEi->info & ~(HEADWORD_FLAG | OVERLAP_FLAG);
00477 
00478                         if( ((_pContainer->_synonymList[ tempPos ].info & 0x3fff0000) >> 16) <= offset ) return 0;
00479 
00480                         return _pContainer->_synonymList[ tempPos + offset ].entry.buffer();
00481                 }
00482         }
00483 
00484         int tempPos = _pContainer->_infoList[ (_pEi->info & 0xffff) ][ index ];
00485 
00486         if( ((_pContainer->_synonymList[ tempPos ].info & 0x3fff0000) >> 16) <= offset ) return 0;
00487 
00488         return _pContainer->_synonymList[ tempPos + offset ].entry.buffer();
00489 }
